short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace IDs with real names on Github

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a great and fantastic extension. It replaces user IDs, on Github and GH Enterprise, with the actual real names (from user's profiles). So when you're looking at "issues" or "PR"s, you don't have to wonder anymore, who is `u123456`, because you will see his real name is "Angus MacCrockodile"!
